title: WHEN YOU START YOUR RANKING CLIMB AT SILVER IV
body: OMG I CANT BELIEVE THIS XD ive only been playing for 5-6 months i love this

replies.body: My first season I got placed Silver II going 5/5, but I didn't belong there.  That was the end of season 4.  Season 5 I went 8/2 got placed bronze I, only climbed to silver V.  Season 6 went 4/6 got placed bronze IV and climbed from there to silver V.  You're often placed higher than you should be your first season.  Play lots of ranked and you'll end up where you belong.  I'm honestly only just now both able and willing to put in the effort to really get better, which is why I'm hoping to do better season 7.  Play to improve and you'll find yourself climbing.
Guys i started playing 5-6 months ago xD

Thats average? 

The system starts you off in silver 4 mmr, you play promos and based on that can be placed anywhere between bronze to gold.
